messages.content: Was the movie Airplane (1977) part of a series of movies?
Yes, the movie "Airplane!" (1980) was followed by a sequel, "Airplane II: The Sequel" (1982). The original film was released in 1980, not 1977. These two films make up the series.
I apologize I meant Airport (1977). Was Airport (1977) part of a series of movies?

Yes, "Airport" (1970) was part of a series of movies. "Airport" was followed by three sequels: "Airport 1975" (1974), "Airport '77" (1977), and "The Concorde... Airport '79" (1979). These films make up the Airport film series.
I asked about Airport (1977) not Airport (1970)

Apologies for the confusion. "Airport '77" (1977) is indeed part of the Airport series of movies. The series includes:

1. "Airport" (1970)
2. "Airport 1975" (1974)
3. "Airport '77" (1977)
4. "The Concorde... Airport '79" (1979)

"Airport '77" is the third film in this series.
